title: I Need Your Love
lyrics:
Our love is something
Baby it is more than love
Our love is something
And I just can't get enough
The walls are closing in

On me oh my

The walls are closing in

On me right now

Just like a boat out in the open sea

Well on the distance, no sirens sing for me

Like Moses he did divide the waves

We'll say that's an infant

To free the slaves



Our love is something

Baby it is more than love

Our love is something

And I just can't get enough

I need your love

I need your love



Just like I'm starved

Exhausted in this draught

I need a drink of water

Oh boy I need it fast

I'm stuck out in the desert

And all I can see

Is [?]

You waiting for me



Our love is something

Baby it is more than love

Our love is something

And I just can't get enough



I need your love

I need your love

I need your love

Well I need your love

I need your kiss

I need your love

All I care every day



Our love is something

Baby it is more than love

Our love is something

And I just can't get enough



Our love is something

Baby it is more than love

Our love is something

And I just can't get enough

I need your love

I need your love

I need your love
